SELECT BOARD_TITLE, READ_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B WHERE NOTICE_FL = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
